guiSET.core

Class GuisetColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.GuisetColor

  • public class GuisetColor
extends java.lang.Object
    Mostly a copy of processings color stuff. Some time ago we needed this to process colors internally but we could also use PApplets static color methods now. Convenience keeps this thing around and also some basic colors are defined here.
    Author:
    Mc-Zen
